condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Eligibility Criteria, Terms and Conditions of On-lending/financing to PFIs | Description :On-lending/financingto PFIs shall be made only in accordance with the Eligibility Criteria, Terms and Conditions listed in Loan Agreement Schedule 2Section I.B.

Finance Agreement :Eligibility Criteria, Terms and Conditions of SME and LE Sub-financing | Description :Sub-financing to SMEs andLEs shall be made only in accordance with the Eligibility Criteria, Terms, Conditions and Approval Procedures listed in LoanAgreement Schedule 2 Section I.C.

title.narrative: Based on Core Indicator: Portfolio Quality: Portfolio at risk (%).
Based on Core Indicator: Financial Sustainability: Return on Assets (%)(Percentage)
Based on Core Indicator: Financial Sustainability: Return on Equity (%)
Export multiplier: Ratio of the export growth of SMEs and LEs under the project relative to the export growth of their equivalent sector.
Gender: Percent of SME and LE beneficiaries financed under the project with at least 15 percent female participation in their workforce.
Number of SME beneficiaries financed by PFIs under the project (cumulative).
Based on Core Indicator: Volume of Bank Support: Lines of Credit - SME (cumulative, US$ million).
Volume of Bank support (cumulative, US$ million).
Number of LE beneficiaries financed by PFIs under the project (cumulative).
Number of active PFIs under the project (cumulative).
Percent of SMEs receiving sub-finance by Eximbank that are new exporters.
Citizen Engagement: SMEs and LEs that feel project sub-finance reflected their needs.
Ratio of the average maturity of LE sub-financing under the project, over the average maturity of the PFIs? LE portfolio not financed under the project.
Ratio of the average maturity of SME sub-financing under the project, over the average maturity of the PFIs' SME portfolio not financed under the project.
Based on Core Indicator: Outstanding SME finance portfolio (US$ million).
Number of active export finance accounts (not cumulative).
Based on Core Indicator: Number of active SME finance accounts (not cumulative).
